summary: Context menu for phantom bookmark after using Find
description:
Using build 20021004 on WinXP

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open the bookmarks sidebar and select a bookmark or folder
2. Type in some text in the Find textarea until the bookmark from step 1 is no
longer shown and there is some whitespace in the sidebar.
3. Right click on the whitespace

Result:
The context menu corresponds to the bookmark selected in step 1.

This is probably just a symptom of Bug 156576, but I'm suggesting we hide 156576 
by deselecting the selected bookmark in the sidebar as soon as a bookmark search
starts.
